Class: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.A24rkaeNHdKThN4N]{Entropist}

Peer into the sands of time.

Qualities

  1. Once per conflict when an ally is about to be the target of an offensive action you may warn them of danger by spending @LOSS[10 mp] to give them @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.13ubm3WjQ8Xuc63Q]{Block}

  2. When you cast @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.spells.odCKj31VovzmcEUw]{Acceleration} you also give the target @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.Uw1tWLyDpdw06ONL]{Aid}

  3. When you cast @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.spells.AAsEhxIBxlig3hRk]{Divination} and force a a target to reroll, you may predict whether the new result of the check will be a failure or success. If you are correct you gain @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.TpmhsH2JmpcsZspZ]{Continuation}
